post.title: the official geometry wars 2 discussion thread
post.content: omg!!!! every mode is so fun and i haven't even got to try multiplayer yet. if you pickup this game send me a fr: leff4 800 points, trial version available. pros: . six modes: deadline, king, evolved, pacifism, waves, sequence . local multiplayer/coop . 1080p . "co-pilot" mode (one player pilots the ship and the other player controls the gunner) cons: . no xbox live multiplayer . only one gun type 1up review: a- eurogamer review: 9/10 ign review: 8.3 impressive developer spotlight: http://loadingreadyrun.com/videos/vi...oper_spotlight trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yxyby99ny38
